duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage projects using established PMO standards, incorporating other approaches as necessary given cultural, situational, ecosystem and other identified factors.
Direct Project meetings and work with Project Sponsor to ensure schedule, deliverables, and overall health of project is on track.
Communicate clearly with team members and stakeholders, resolving any issues and solving problems throughout project life cycle.
Formally document and update all project-related items including implementation plan, project scope, charter, goals, deliverables, risks, project milestones, schedule, and any all-related items.
Identify and clearly communicate expectations to team members and stakeholders through the course of the project.

education_certification.credential: University degree in business or related field preferred. 3 to 5 years of direct experience in Project Management, Program Management, or similar experience. Project Management Professional PMP or Certified Associate in Project Management CAPM or a related PMI Certification preferred or within one year of hire.
